description: Always ready for sunny shores, these pants block out harmful rays with built-in UPF 50 protective tech.  Elastic at the waist and cinching at the cuffs allow you to find a just-right fit.  Carry small essentials with back pockets, hand pockets, and cargo pockets with hook-and-loop closures.
name: Columbia Sportswear Rapid Rivers Cargo Pants, Reg, Extended - Mens
